name: Fun With Guns
description:
"Fun With Guns" Is A Faced - Pased Shooter Where You Use Your Gun to Kill Enemies So You Could Be Victorious. 

CONTROLS:

WASD or the arrow keys to move

Left Click To Shoot

Shift To Slowmo

the game is pretty unfinished cuz i ran out of events but i hope you like it anyways 

Game Made For The VimJam.

Theme: There And Back

Limitation: Collectables
